duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform moderate and high complexity patient testing in the clinical laboratory.
Perform advanced troubleshooting, maintenance, and problem resolution.
Demonstrate strong decision-making skills and ability to work independently.
Take on teaching/training responsibilities as needed.
Maintain good relations with physicians, clinic staff, and co-workers.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree in laboratory science or medical laboratory technology, or equivalent to an associate degree with specific course requirements.
Bachelor’s degree in a chemical, physical, biological, or clinical laboratory science, or medical technology is preferred.
60 semester hours with specific course requirements is preferred.
